title: GCash Overseas
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

**Get Started with GCash Overseas**

- [GCash Overseas Available Countries and Services](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/28753833785241-GCash-Overseas-Available-Countries-and-Services)
- [Register to GCash Overseas](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/28752622792089-Register-to-GCash-Overseas)
- [Get Fully Verified with GCash Overseas](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/28753574565145-Get-Fully-Verified-with-GCash-Overseas)
- [How to use GCash Overseas](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005342766-How-to-use-GCash-Overseas)

**Cash in via International Banks and Partners**

- [How do I link my US bank account to GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31650526006169-How-do-I-link-my-US-bank-account-to-GCash)
- [What are the official US bank channels for Cash in?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31650294812185-What-are-the-official-US-bank-channels-for-Cash-in)
- [How do I cash in to GCash with a EU/UK or US Bank account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360025275074-How-do-I-cash-in-to-GCash-with-a-EU-UK-or-US-Bank-account)
- [What are the official EU/UK bank channels for Cash in?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38713174904985-What-are-the-official-EU-UK-bank-channels-for-Cash-in)

**Claim Remittance**

- [How do I claim/receive my remittance with GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/28286340757017-How-do-I-claim-receive-my-remittance-with-GCash)
- [How can I send remittance to a GCash wallet?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31651143866137-How-can-I-send-remittance-to-a-GCash-wallet)
- [Who are the official remittance partners of GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31649034176537-Who-are-the-official-remittance-partners-of-GCash)

**GSave Overseas by CIMB**

- [How do I apply for a GSave Overseas account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38547564790809-How-do-I-apply-for-a-GSave-Overseas-account)
- [What are the GSave Overseas Interest Rates?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38547938236185-What-are-the-GSave-Overseas-Interest-Rates)
- [How do I withdraw from my GSave Overseas account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39124269488793-How-do-I-withdraw-from-my-GSave-Overseas-account)
- [How do I deposit in my GSave Overseas account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39124080738457-How-do-I-deposit-in-my-GSave-Overseas-account)
- [How do I delete my GSave Overseas account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38545636825497-How-do-I-delete-my-GSave-Overseas-account)

**Cash In via Linked International Partners**

- [How do I link my Payoneer to GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900002482846-How-do-I-link-my-Payoneer-to-GCash)
- [How do I cash in to GCash using Payoneer?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900002482806-How-do-I-cash-in-to-GCash-using-Payoneer)
- [How do I link my PayPal to GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360019948834-How-do-I-link-my-PayPal-to-GCash)
- [How do I cash in to GCash using PayPal?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360020281973-How-do-I-cash-in-to-GCash-using-PayPal)

Back to Top
